name: Everburning Ashes
description:
The only man vs. closet game ever made!

Your player wakes up hearing a noise from his closet. He checks what's in there and gets sucked in by a black hole. Fight your way trough waves of enemies to get out of the closet.

(full screen recommended)

A game made by Jan Neys, Wannes De Maeyer, Arsenii Kolesnikov (the name is spelled wrong in the game) and Elien Van Loy.
